biotools.summary:
An in silico phase I and II drug metabolism prediction platform.

PreMetabo – Just another BMDRC Sites site.

CYP 2C9, 2C19, 2D6, 3A4 Inhibitor / Non-inhibitor, CYP 2D6, 3A4 Substrate / Non-substrate.

CYP 3A4, 1A2, 2C9, 2D6 Site of Metabolism (SOM) prediction.
